original_title: 美人家庭教師みなみ先生の接吻レクチャー個人レッスン
overview: Minami Aizawa is a teacher who gets a part-time job as a tutor. She then, found it humourous to tease the young guy and teach him to kiss.  Minami is blessed with superior beauty and delivers once again a good performance.
title: Ms. Minami Is My Beautiful Private Tutor And She’s Giving Me A Private Kissing Lecture And Lesson Minami Aizawa
